start_message: ⚡️ Heya!! Myself PokeDex Bot for players of @HeXamonbot 🥳, developed by @Warning_MadBoy_is_Back. MadBoy merged me with a Telegram Bot. He's teaching me some commands, for now I learned these: 💠 /start : You just used it. 🙃 💠 /data Pokemon Name : Get info about a particular Pokémon 💠 /types : Info about different Pokémon types 💠 /ptype Pokemon Name : Get to know the type of a particular Pokémon 💠 /type Type Name : Get info about a particular type 💠 /faq : FAQ ❓ 💠 /about : Informations about me 🤩
error1: ⚡️ Ooops! MadBoy is teaching me many things, but I still can't read in thought. Use this Syntax: /data Pokemon Name Eg.: /data Mewtwo
results: I traveled to 8 regions with my trainer but I have never heard of such a Pokémon 🧐 However, I can find the 3 closest Pokémon to what you told me Here are the results ⚡️
about: ⚡️ Oh Hi! Myself PokeDex Bot for players of @HeXamonbot 🥳, developed by @Warning_MadBoy_is_Back. Do you want some more info about me? Well, I'll give you some interesting links ⬇️ 🌐 GitHub I'm open-source! https://github.com/inhumanxd/inhumanDexBot I'm Open-Source! https://github.com/madboy482/PokeDex 🙏 Credits 🙏 ✨ @Warning_MadBoy_is_Back (Bot Developer) ✨ @alessiocelentano (Data Organization) ✨ @gianlucatarantino (Additional Data) ✨ pokemondb.net (Sata) ✨ pokemon.com (ArtWorks)
limit: ⚡️⚡️😵⚡️😵 Ooooof 😵⚡️⚡️😵⚡️ Oh Arceus, do you want to drive me crazy? Well don't do it anymore, there are no Pokémon with more than 25 characters in the database
nomatch: Write in a language understandable to humans (and Pokémons)
not_admin: You cannot use this command because you aren't an admin
added: ⚡️ Oh, Hey There! Thanks for adding me, Myself PokeDex Bot for players of @HeXamonbot 🥳, developed by @Warning_MadBoy_is_Back. MadBoy merged me with a Telegram Bot. I can give you a lot of informations about the Pokemon world! These are my commands: 💠 /start : Command List. 🙃 💠 /data Pokemon Name : Get info about a particular Pokémon 💠 /types : Info about different Pokémon types 💠 /ptype Pokemon Name : Get to know the type of a particular Pokémon 💠 /type Type Name : Get info about a particular type 💠 /faq : FAQ ❓ 💠 /about : Informations about me 🤩
faq: ❓ FAQ Q: What is PokeDex? A: PokeDex is actually an updated version bot developed by @Warning_MadBoy_is_Back, which acts as a helper for trainers on Telegram. You can check information of Pokémon, and check effectiveness; weakness of Pokémon types as quickly as possible, without ever leaving Telegram Q: How to get Pokemon informations? A: Just write Pokemon name after /data command (Eg.: /data Mewtwo) Q: How can I help? A: You can help me in several ways: - Pull Request/Issue on PokeDex GitHub Repository - Report me tips/bugs in private (@Warning_MadBoy_is_Back)
